医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
没有证据表明特朗普针对晚期患者的药物计划挽救了“数千人”的生命前总统唐纳德·特朗普近几个月来吹嘘他于 2018 年签署的一项法律“尝试权”。该法律旨在促进绝症患者获得尚未获得美国食品和药物管理局批准的可能挽救生命的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/No-evidence-Trumpe28099s-drug-program-for-terminal-病人-saved-e28098thousandse28099-of-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/No-evidence-Trumpe28099s-drug-program-for-terminal-病人-saved-e28098thousandse28099-of-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a45d950-4c82-4b66-be9b-414d0e6a6674 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 13:17:47 -0500 No evidence Trump’s drug program for terminal patients saved ‘thousands’ of lives
选举结果可能会给医疗保险带来重大变化在竞选过程中，前总统唐纳德·特朗普和副总统卡马拉·哈里斯都渴望将自己描绘成医疗保险的守护者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Election-outcome-could-bring-big-changes-to-Medicare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Election-outcome-could-bring-big-changes-to-Medicare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=943e7a8e-05c8-4b33-a967-557945118e7b Tue, 05 Nov 2024 13:14:08 -0500 Election outcome could bring big changes to Medicare
随着修女的消失，许多天主教医院看起来更像是大型企业据天主教健康协会称，在全国600多家天主教医院中，没有一个修女占据首席执行官套房。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/As-nuns-disappear-many-Catholic-hospitals-look-more-like-megacorporations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/As-nuns-disappear-many-Catholic-hospitals-look-more-like-megacorporations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80eac463-b122-44ea-aa04-41f16b5686f4 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 13:13:08 -0500 As nuns disappear, many Catholic hospitals look more like megacorporations
快速返回学校和进行轻度锻炼可能有助于孩子从脑震荡中恢复在四月的啦啦队训练中，贾娜·杜伊 (Jana Duey) 六年级的女儿卡特 (Karter) 从几英尺高处摔倒在体育馆的地板垫上，导致脑震荡。几天后，卡特仍然感到头痛、头晕、对光和噪音敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/A-quick-return-to-school-and-light-exercise-may-help-kids-recover-from-concussions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/A-quick-return-to-school-and-light-exercise-may-help-kids-recover-from-concussions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18b0c550-21f7-402c-bc84-16993b4d50b7 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 13:10:14 -0500 A quick return to school and light exercise may help kids recover from concussions
研究揭示了使用更少能量的除颤方法在 AIP 出版社本周在 Chaos 上发表的一篇论文中，来自哥伦比亚波哥大塞尔吉奥阿博莱达大学和亚特兰大佐治亚理工学院的研究人员使用心脏电路的电生理计算机模型来检查施加电压场的影响在多种颤动-除颤场景中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Research-unveils-method-for-defibrillation-using-less-energy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Research-unveils-method-for-defibrillation-using-less-energy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b33b4064-ff21-4fd0-a1ee-fd071e3bbfdb Tue, 05 Nov 2024 13:01:34 -0500 Research unveils method for defibrillation using less energy
加拿大乳腺癌筛查指南未能解决种族和民族差异加拿大目前的国家乳腺癌筛查指南不太适合某些种族和族裔群体的女性，因为她们在较年轻的时候被诊断出乳腺癌，且处于晚期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Canadas-breast-cancer-screening-guidelines-fail-to-address-racial-and-ethnic-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Canadas-breast-cancer-screening-guidelines-fail-to-address-racial-and-ethnic-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ab03d0b-f3d9-4cd7-a33b-6f4b5eb2124a Tue, 05 Nov 2024 12:51:28 -0500 Canada's breast cancer screening guidelines fail to address racial and ethnic disparities
沃纳综合征基因在维持细胞组织和 DNA 稳定性方面发挥着关键作用2024年10月17日，一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 20 期，题为“Werner 综合征” RECQ 解旋酶参与并指导增殖的人类细胞中组成型异染色质蛋白复合物的维持。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Werner-syndrome-gene-plays-key-role-in-maintaining-cellular-organization-and-DNA-stability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Werner-syndrome-gene-plays-key-role-in-maintaining-cellular-organization-and-DNA-stability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a884dab5-cf7f-4793-8a72-d4f12062a3a8 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 12:44:40 -0500 Werner syndrome gene plays key role in maintaining cellular organization and DNA stability
专家表示，创伤性脑损伤应被视为一种慢性疾病《神经创伤杂志》上发表的一篇评论呼吁将创伤性脑损伤视为一种慢性疾病，就像糖尿病、哮喘、抑郁症和心力衰竭一样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Traumatic-brain-injury-should-be-recognized-as-a-chronic-condition-experts-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Traumatic-brain-injury-should-be-recognized-as-a-chronic-condition-experts-say.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22fd134b-b3dd-4d47-8b6a-8f49a4641945 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 12:39:06 -0500 Traumatic brain injury should be recognized as a chronic condition, experts say
都柏林大学研究人员获得欧洲研究委员会 NanoX 项目协同资助都柏林大学学院 (UCD) 研究员 Nicola Fletcher 博士因其开创性的 NanoX 项目获得了令人垂涎的欧洲研究委员会 (ERC) 协同补助金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/UCD-researcher-wins-European-Research-Council-Synergy-Grant-for-NanoX-project.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/UCD-researcher-wins-European-Research-Council-Synergy-Grant-for-NanoX-project.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aed1682-cb93-40ef-90d8-a22046b6e1b8 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 12:23:00 -0500 UCD researcher wins European Research Council Synergy Grant for NanoX project
AMPA 受体可视化新技术为精神疾病提供了见解尽管精神分裂症、双相情感障碍和自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）等精神疾病相当常见，但其诊断和治疗具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/New-technology-for-visualizing-AMPA-receptors-offers-insights-into-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/New-technology-for-visualizing-AMPA-receptors-offers-insights-into-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09fe80fd-ba34-42f0-9d4c-2ceffd68227c Tue, 05 Nov 2024 11:41:57 -0500 New technology for visualizing AMPA receptors offers insights into psychiatric disorders
